Package gamelogic.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
gamelogic.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
Board of the Dots and Boxes game.

  • Method Details

    • getBoxes

      public Box[] getBoxes()
      Retrieves the boxes of the board.
      Returns:
      the array of boxes.

    • getMarks

      public Mark[] getMarks()
      Retrieves the marks of the board.
      Returns:
      the array of marks.

    • setBoardVisualization

      public void setBoardVisualization(BoardVisualization boardVisualization)
      Associates the board with a board visualization.
      Parameters:
      boardVisualization - , the board visualizer.

    • gameOver

      public boolean gameOver()
      Establishes when a game is over.
      Returns:
      the game over state.

    • associateLinesWithBoxes

      public void associateLinesWithBoxes()
      Associates the lines with the boxes. There are 25 boxes and 60 lines, and this method associates 4 lines with each box. For example, box 0 has lines 0, 5, 6, 11; box 1 has lines 1, 6, 7, 12;box 2 has lines 2, 7, 8, 13; etc.

    • calculateNrOfLines

      public int calculateNrOfLines(int dim)
      Calculates the number of lines based on a given dimension.
      Parameters:
      dim - the given dimension.
      Returns:
      the resulted number of possible lines to be drawn.

    • deepCopy

      public Board deepCopy()
      Performs a deep copy of the board, with all its fields.

    • isField

      public boolean isField(int index)
      Checks whether an index is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index in the array.

    • isLine

      public boolean isLine(int index) throws InvalidMoveException
      Checks whether there is a line at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the line.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the index is not valid.

    • setMark

      public void setMark(int index, Mark mark)
      Sets a specific mark at a specific location.
      Parameters:
      index - of the mark, corresponding with the line.
      mark - the mark at that specific location.

    • drawLine

      public void drawLine(Line l)
      Draws a line at a specific index. It also associates the line with the boxes every time a line is drawn.
      Parameters:
      l - the line to be drawn.

    • getLine

      public Line getLine(int index)
      Query for getting a line at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - of the line to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the line.

    • getMark

      public Mark getMark(int index)
      Query for getting a mark at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - of the mark to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the mark.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks whether the board is full.
      Returns:
      the full condition of the board.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the board is empty.
      Returns:
      the empty condition of the board.

    • determineBox

      public boolean determineBox(int boxIndex) throws NonexistentBoxException
      Checks if a box is completed, i.e., all its 4 lines are drawn.
      Parameters:
      boxIndex - the index of the box.
      Throws:
      NonexistentBoxException - if the index of the box is not valid.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the board to its initial state, e.g. no lines, no marks, no box owners.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Displays the board in the TUI.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string of the board;
